execution_plan.description: Find IDs of all customers who are female (matching common gender_code values).
execution_plan.query: SELECT customer_id FROM customers WHERE gender_code IN ('F','f','Female','female');

execution_plan.description: From the orders database, get distinct product_ids for orders placed by the customers found in step 1 (join Orders to Order_Items to retrieve products purchased).
execution_plan.query: SELECT DISTINCT oi.product_id FROM Orders o INNER JOIN Order_Items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id WHERE o.customer_id IN ($step1.customer_id);

execution_plan.description: Fetch distinct product name, price and description from the products database for the product_ids returned in step 2.
execution_plan.query: SELECT DISTINCT product_id, product_name, product_price, product_description FROM Products WHERE product_id IN ($step2.product_id);
